DESCRIPTION: Performs a bitwise mask read operation.
EXAMPLE: <h3>BitMaskRead Example</h3> <p>Returns integer created from <em>length</em> bits of <em>number</em>, beginning with <em>start</em>.</p> <p>BitMaskRead(255, 4, 4): <cfoutput>#BitMaskRead(255, 4, 4)#</cfoutput></p> <p>BitMaskRead(255, 0, 4): <cfoutput>#BitMaskRead(255, 0, 4)#</cfoutput></p> <p>BitMaskRead(128, 0, 7): <cfoutput>#BitMaskRead(128, 0, 7)#</cfoutput></p>
USAGE: Bit functions operate on 32-bit signed integers, in the range -2147483648 â€“ 2147483647.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; start bit for read
Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; length of mask
